data.name: Global Azure Day - Milwaukee
data.description:
All around the world user groups and communities want to learn about Azure and Cloud Computing!
On April 23-25, 2020, all communities will come together once again in the seventh great Global Azure event! Each user group organizes their own one to three day Azure event the way they see fit and how i…

relatedRecords.name: Seattle GNU/Linux (aka SeaGL)
relatedRecords.description: SeaGL is a grassroots technical conference dedicated to spreading awareness and knowledge about the GNU/Linux community and free/libre/open-source software/hardware.

relatedRecords.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
relatedRecords.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.
